SENT.plain: The authors report two cases of achondrogenesis, the first of which was diagnosed in utero
Ultrasonographic abnormalities suggested the diagnosis, which was confirmed radiographically
The diagnosis of achondrogenesis in utero made it possible to avoid a Cesarian
It is always difficult to extract the malformed fetus
The histopathology findings make it possible to codify this rare type of congenital and lethal chondrodysplasia
Achondrogenesis is probably inherited in a recessive and autosomic fashion
